snippet.textDisplay: One thing I love about the black man is that Whan he finally rises up to fight his oppressors, he would fight to the finish! The time is near!!!
snippet.textOriginal: One thing I love about the black man is that Whan he finally rises up to fight his oppressors, he would fight to the finish! The time is near!!!

snippet.textDisplay: I believe you my guy. I've always been saying we are still very comfortable. When we've suffered enough, we won't be afraid of death, we'll come out and fight with our last blood so that what's remaining of our future and then, the future of our Children won't be what we have today. I also believe the time is near. I see how aggressive Nigerians are becoming on a daily basis.
snippet.textOriginal: I believe you my guy. I've always been saying we are still very comfortable. When we've suffered enough, we won't be afraid of death, we'll come out and fight with our last blood so that what's remaining of our future and then, the future of our Children won't be what we have today. I also believe the time is near. I see how aggressive Nigerians are becoming on a daily basis.
